data.comment: An attacking Anderlecht player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 34, David Bates (Cercle Brugge) gets a yellow card.
Lukas Nmecha smashes in a penalty at Lotto Park. The score is now 1-0.
Johanna Omolo is booked for the away team.
In the minute 43, Ognjen Vranjes for Anderlecht has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 59, Robbe Decostere (Cercle Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
Franck Kanoute is replacing Johanna Omolo for Cercle Brugge at Lotto Park.
The away team replace Anthony Musaba with Kylian Hazard.
In the minute 67, Alexander Corryn (Cercle Brugge) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Dimitar Velkovski.
Goal! Anderlecht extend their lead to 2-0 through Michael Murillo.
Adrien Trebel instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Zakaria Bakkali with Yari Verschaeren. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Kompany.
Mustapha Bundu is on a sub for Jeremy Doku for Anderlecht.
Franck Kanoute (Cercle Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 87, Anouar Ait El Hadj is replacing Lukas Nmecha for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
